QuestData.Title: Trophy of Glory: Crater Lord Igneous
QuestData.Description: Defeating Crater Lord Igneous has yielded you a trophy worthy of acclaim.$b$bTake this to Maraad at Highpass.
QuestData.LogDescription: Take the trophy to Maraad at Highpass in Gorgrond.
QuestData.RewardText: I thought I felt less quakes in the earth. His fury caused untold damage to this world, it is good that he has fallen to you.
